item.description:
Equipment: climbing gear, tent, sleeping bag suitable for the weather, clothing suitable for climbing and variable weather, digital camera and anything else you want or need to bring

Directions: 93 north to exit 26 take rt25 west, come to the rotary stay on rt25 west. pass polar caves on your left. follow rt25 to rumney village take a right onto main street(double blinking yellow lights) follow main st. go over bridge come to buffalo rd on the left(white church on the corner) follow buffalo rd to the parking lot of rumney climbing.

Camping: Rattlesnake Mtn. Campground. $12.00 per person per night.

Dinner: pot luck BRING something, share something and eat HEARTY, Hannafords food market up there

Meeting at: Friday night at Rattlesnake campground

saturday morning at the pay station picnic table 9:00am
item.how_to_find_us: Friday 7:00pm @ wellington station or Saturday morning 9:00am @ the pay station picnic table in the main parking lot
item.name: Columbus day Foliage climbing in Rumney nh
